info.name: Duolingo hide leagues
info.description: This userstyle hides the leagues seen on the homepage of Duolingo(.com)
info.additionalInfo: Updates: (dd-mm-yyyy) 19-09-2022 | Fixed userstyle (same thing...) 07-03-2021 | Fixed userstyle (How long has this been broken?) 30-03-2020 | Fixed userstyle (broke since Duolingo updated their site) 09-06-2019 | Style released!
